title: Textile
medium:
Medium: linen and silk
Technique: plain compound satin
description: Light blue satin design on ground  formed by extra yellow silk weft floated out on surface of fabric and tied down in twill by blue silk warp. White linen functional weft hidden. Very large-scale symmetrical design of central pomegranate blossom flanked by great swinging acanthus branches terminating in massive ornamental flower. Both selvages present.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile.Medium: linen and silk
Technique: plain compound satin. 1931-50-1.
